channel.title: Windows on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: Windows CLI Commands Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Fast-access PowerShell reference for system administration, automation, security auditing, covering file management, networking, scripting, and Winget for IT pros and analysts.

item.title: Windows Registry Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Key Windows Registry locations for persistence mechanisms, user activity traces, and IOC hunting in malware analysis and forensic investigations for DFIR professionals.

item.title: Windows Log Analysis Cheat Sheet (+ Chainsaw)
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Critical Windows event IDs, logon types, and log locations for threat hunting and incident response, including Security.evtx, PowerShell logs, and Chainsaw analysis techniques.
